    Hi, I am Sachin. I am currently working as a machine learning engineer at Mercedes Benz Cars. In my current project, I develop insights from customer data for product improvement. This website serves as a space for me to share my latest interests. I am into all things tech. In my free time I like to go on hikes, cook and workout.
